rules.title: System must use encryption to protect audit tools
rules.description: Prevent modification of audit tools to hide activities

rules.title: System must not have systemd-timesyncd package installed
rules.description: Inaccurate time makes it difficult to correlate events and analyze

rules.title: System must not have ntp package installed
rules.description: NTP is no longer recommended, vulnerable to attacks and lacks accuracy

rules.title: System must not have telnetd package installed
rules.description: Telnet transmits passwords in plaintext, easy to sniff and exploit

rules.title: System must not have rsh-server package installed
rules.description: RSH transmits passwords in plaintext, similar to telnet

rules.title: OS must install AIDE for integrity checking
rules.description: Ensure detection of errors or intrusion file system changes

rules.title: Configure AIDE to perform integrity checks
AIDE must use default script to run periodically
AIDE must send alerts when baseline is changed
rules.description: Prevent configuration changes from being missed

rules.title: OS must store failure events using rsyslog
rules.description: Ensure logs are maintained for forensics and recovery
